actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill relating to the mitigating of any liquidated damages or penalties due on certain scenery imported for the use of the American Ballet Theatre, New York, New York, to the level of the duty that otherwise would have been due had the scenery been entered for consumption on dates of entry in 1980.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mitigate any liquidated damages or penalties due on temporary import bonds made with respect to certain property for the use of a New York ballet company.

titles.title: A bill relating to the mitigating of any liquidated damages or penalties due on certain scenery imported for the use of the American Ballet Theatre, New York, New York, to the level of the duty that otherwise would have been due had the scenery been entered for consumption on dates of entry in 1980.
